definition: a long way in front/to lead by a wide margin
far in the indefinite future (idiom); so far away it seems forever

sentences.english: The US is far ahead," he said.
sentences.chinese: 美國已經在方面遙遙領先了，”他說。

sentences.english: As an individual country, America still leads the world by some distance.
sentences.chinese: 按單國來論，美國在世界上仍然遙遙領先。

sentences.english: But no U.S.-Taiwan free trade agreement is pending.
sentences.chinese: 但是，美臺籤自由貿易協定還遙遙無期。

sentences.english: Temple before the show and a distant relative, Reliance behind Mau Lam Xiuzhu Moonlight Hill.
sentences.chinese: 前與秀山寺遙遙相對，背後倚茂林修竹的月光山。

sentences.english: Said to distant away point the Kang city grows a princess of see Peng.
sentences.chinese: 說着遙遙指了指康城長公主的看棚。

sentences.english: My boat is sailing in brisk pace and the wind is blowing my clothing happily.
sentences.chinese: 舟遙遙以輕颺，風飄飄而吹衣。

sentences.english: You’ll be far far ahead before they realize what to do.
sentences.chinese: 你已經在他們意識到如何做之前遙遙領先。

sentences.english: Far away hopeless day of date of return.
Hern and I sat at two corners of the porch face to face, holding our blanket together.
sentences.chinese: 荷和我擁衾對坐，在廊子的兩角，遙遙談話。

sentences.english: Our language is the best by a mile.
sentences.chinese: 我們的語言遙遙領先，頂頂棒。

sentences.english: The technology and telecommunications in Shenzhen are cutting edge!
sentences.chinese: 深圳的科技和電訊業遙遙領先。

sentences.english: And growing is that sinuous road.
sentences.chinese: 而成長就是那彎遙遙迢迢的來時路。

sentences.english: As Barack Obama appears to pull ahead, what options remain for John McCain?
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬遙遙領先，麥凱恩無力迴天？

sentences.english: Araya is on the brink of losing it all and is doubtful that he will ever return to Wall Street.
sentences.chinese: 至於有沒有重歸華爾街的希望，那就遙遙無期了。

sentences.english: Genuine racial equality still seems away.
sentences.chinese: 真正蹬種族平等似忽仍遙遙無欺。

definition: unspecified period/in the indefinite future/no fixed time/indefinite sentence (i.e. life imprisonment)
to have no opportunity/no way (of doing sth)/no chance/no connection/not placed (in a competition)/(in pop lyrics) no chance of love, no place to be together etc
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation
not to see/not to meet/to have disappeared/to be missing
to raise one's head/to gain ground/account name, or space for writing the name on checks, bills etc
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
